CurrentVersion.title: Office App: Idle Session Timeout for Microsoft 365 Web Apps - Government Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Idle session timeout feature allows IT admins to configure a tenant-wide timeout value based on which users get automatically signed out after a period of inactivity on Microsoft 365 web apps. This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

OldVersion.title: Office App: Idle Session Timeout for Microsoft 365 Web Apps - Government Cloud
OldVersion.description: Idle session timeout feature allows IT admins to configure a tenant-wide timeout value based on which users get automatically signed out after a period of inactivity on Microsoft 365 web apps. This feature is an improvement over, and will eventually replace, current idle timeout settings in Outlook Web App (OWA) and SharePoint Online (SPO).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand. Note: We will not be rolling out to Government Clouds at this time.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
OldVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand. Note: We will not be rolling out to Government Clouds at this time.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reporting improvements (Leverage policy insights)
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance message details report will support additional user filter to create and download the report for specific users in the policy. The items per policy report will provide item counts and actions on the items matched in the specified date range.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reporting improvements (Leverage policy insights)
OldVersion.description: Communication Compliance message details report will support additional user filter to create and download the report for specific users in the policy. The items per policy report will provide item counts and actions on the items matched in the specified date range.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bulk export of learner completion records
CurrentVersion.description: Learner Completion Record bulk export is an extension of an existing feature to download Learner record by username. Bulk export empowers enterprises to download learner records of multiple users in one go using the M365 groups.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bulk export Learner Completion record
OldVersion.description: Learner Completion Record bulk export is an extension of an existing feature to download Learner record by username. Bulk export empowers enterprises to download learner records of multiple users in one go using the M365 groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot for Microsoft 365, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
OldVersion.description: ,Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
OldVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Change to shared folder experience in OneDrive
OldVersion.description: We're making a change to the shared folder experience in OneDrive. Currently, when a user opens a shared folder in OneDrive, they are taken to a view of that folder within the sharers OneDrive. In the new experience, opening a shared folder will take the user to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This view, organized by people, shows and allows access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

OldVersion.title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
OldVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
CurrentVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

OldVersion.title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
OldVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
OldVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Create EPM rules based on a support approve requests and reporting entries
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now create rules directly from support approval requests and from entries in the elevation report. Previously rules had to be created by hand by entering in all the information about the elevation and how it should be managed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Improved elevation detection
CurrentVersion.description: ,This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. It brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project for the web into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web settings. If a reset is done in web, this will affect the account across Outlook.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
OldVersion.description: Allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web settings. If a reset is done in web, this will affect the account across Outlook.
